title: (17457) Riudellots de la Selva - 24 Carrer Palmeres
title_short: (17457) Riudellots de la Selva - 24 Carrer Palmeres
description: Municipal parking area for motorhomes and campers. Capacity 3 motorhomes and 2 campers. Located next to the municipal swimming pool, and a picnic area that has 2 tables and a fountain. Maximum parking time 72 hours.

title: (17242) Quart - Avda. de la Bòbila s/n
title_short: (17242) Quart - Avda. de la Bòbila s/n
description:
Free area for RVs no limit nger than 6.5 meters including water, grey water/potty emptying facilities  
much glass before the cleaning Place!!!
 5 spots for overnight parking (all free of charge). There are also recycling bins right next to the parking, plus a small neighbourhood "supermarket" a few blocks away. There's also a biking route nearby the leads to Girona in one direction (6 km) and Sant Feliu de Guíxols in the other (a tad further...35 km).

Very quiet at night, but a different story in the morning, as it's adjacent to a nursery school (you can guess the rest). Also worth noting: If you're coming from Girona and your navigator suggests the first exit to Quart, take into account that it involves going under a bridge with a 3m height limit, but there's another exit a few hundred metres further.

Please DO remember that this space is shared with local residents--it's actually the parking for the nursery school, so please be discreet and civil. Having spoken to the mayor (who I ran into by mere chance, and is very friendly and understanding), I can confirm that they don't mind us using some of the other spots not reserved for motorhomes, but 1) Only use the spots in the first row, next to the free facilities and 2) PLEASE do not park sideways: it's OK if you stick out a bit, but 3 RVs taking up 15 parking spots in NOT OK. It's rare to find FREE spots like this, so please be respectful, if not out of gratitude, for continuity's sake, or in the long run they'll end up being removed. Whether we choose to see it this way or not, we *are* indeed a community, our actions will surely affect those who come after us.

title: (17455) Caldes de Malavella - Carrer Solei
description: Not possible with a trailer! Very quiet area with 5 places 300m from the center, with water and electricity (electricity works according to the street lighting program). We were there and at 9am when the lights were off we had electricity. That alone, there are 4 connectors for the 5-seater, so if you're last you'll have to connect using another motorhome. For the last place you will need a 50 meter extension to reach the socket area. Be careful, the only problem is that your motorhome will be drowned in the droppings of pigeons and birds. At 100 meters you have a thermal hot spring. The inhabitants come to fill their bottles there to drink it without problem.

No services. Space for picnicking. Ideal with a dog. Weak 4g reception. Slightly sloping ground. Passage the day of mountain biker, hiker and some motorcycles.

name: Àrea d'Autocaravanes de l'Agrobotiga Mas Bes
title: (17184) Àrea d'Autocaravanes de l'Agrobotiga Mas Bes
title_short: (17184) Àrea d'Autocaravanes de l'Agrobotiga Mas Bes
description: Mas Bes Farm Area in Salitja, Vilobí d'Onyar (Girona). Routes on foot or by bike through the greenways of the municipality. At 900 meters is the hermitage of the Mare de Déu de les Fonts (17th century), at the foot of the La Crosa de Sant Dalmai volcano. Se - Granja Mas Bes offers a free visit to the Museum of the ancient crafts of the field. - Possibility of a guided tour of the farm. Saturdays and Sundays at 11:30 a.m. (ask for availability). Preparation of fresh milk, yogurts, mató and artisan ice creams. Preparation of cannelloni and fresh meat from our calves.

name: Parking Vayreda Autocaravanas
title: (17001) Parking Vayreda Autocaravanas
description: The Parking Vayreda Autocaravanas is located in the Pasaje de Massaguer with location by means of the coordinates 41º59'03.2 "N and 02º48'50.1" E. Central and very well located to visit the city of Girona and its cultural heritage: the Cathedral, the neighborhood Jewish, the Arab baths, the Ramblas, the wall, the Devesa. It has 37 spaces with exclusive access for parking users, has personal assistance during working hours and is equipped with video surveillance and permanent lighting. There are intercom points inside and outside the area, to be able to communicate with the staff of the center. Parking users have differentiated health services for women, men and people with disabilities. The establishment allows you to spend the night and has a supply of drinking water, electric charge and evacuation, gray water and waste water and free WIFI service.

address.street: 14 Passatge Massaguer (Parking Vayreda Autocaravanas). Email: clientes@empark.com

title: (17441) Brunyola - Unnamed Road
description: Nice and calm place in the nature. You have to drive backwards down. For most campers to do. Beware of the ground. If it is wet it is possible difficult to drive away

title: (17246) Santa Cristina d'Aro - 11 Carretera Gerona
description: Visit the museum de Magia. from the illusionist Xevi costs 5 euros in summer open at 7 p.m. winter on Sunday at noon really worth it!

title: (17246) Santa Cristina d'Aro -
description: Parking is highly recommended. It is a very large esplanade of fairly well leveled ground. It is easy to access. there is no indication of parking, so in principle, you can park both vans and motorhomes. it is located next to the road, just before entering the village, but it is very quiet and there is not much noise at night. there is a school next door. We had no problems, but I imagine that during the school season, there will be more noise in the morning. it has no source of water. The only one nearby is on the other side of the road, in front of the tourist office, but when we went there, it was cordoned off.

title: (17118) - Unnamed Road
description: Flat location 10 minutes from the Ganga pass. Reserved for SUV and 4x4. Risk of being closed in summer due to fire risks

title: (17150) Sant Gregori - Passeig de ľArgelaguet
description: -A large car park in the middle of nature, near the village of Sant Gregori (Gironès). -Food stores, supermarkets and restaurants within 1 km. -In summer (approx. June 15 to September 11) municipal swimming pool open (200 m). -Starting point for hiking routes and trails.

title: (17121) Monells - 5B Carrer del Portalet
description: Parking not prohibited for motorhomes. Very pretty historic village. Small pleasant stroll.

title: (17007) Girona - 8 Carrer Embusteros
description: Simple, quiet parking lot. There are public, freely accessible toilets at the gas station nearby.

title: (17246) Sant Feliu de Guíxols -
description: Beautiful and quiet parking, without mobile home prohibition signs, in a sparse cork oak forest. Only 5km away from the Costa Brava and still far away from all the hustle and bustle of the coast. There are several pitches on partly level and partly slightly sloping ground. (Caution some thick roots). Easy access from Sant Feliu via asphalt road. The highlight is the rocking stone of Pedralta and the great view. Suitable for a picnic in the shade of the trees as well as for an undisturbed overnight stay.

title: (17121) Monells - 19 Carrer de la Riera
description: Free ground parking, well leveled, with a shaded area and very close to the city. During the day there are quite a few cars. Although the road is nearby, at night most vehicles do not pass. There is a hotel air conditioning system that sounds a bit from time to time, but for us it was not a problem. We had a very quiet night. Take a leisurely stroll through this beautiful city and enjoy taking something on the spot.

title: (17240) Llagostera - Unnamed Road
description: Quiet place in the middle of a road, we were able to arrive perfect with the vehicle on a good road

title: (17421) Riudarenes - 48 Carrer Santa Coloma
description: We were looking for a place and were able to stay the night for a party. It was Saturday to Sunday so that wasn't a problem at all and we stayed until almost 6 p.m.

title: (17421) Riudarenes - 41 Carrer Cami de la Riera
title_short: (17421) Riudarenes - 41 Carrer Cami de la Riera
description: Quiet parking. In the middle of nature. In the village there is a supermarket and a bakery. Sundays market. Possibility of many routes by mountain bike

title: (17100) Sant Pol -
description: Quiet place to rest without noise surrounded by nature.

name: wecamp Santa Cristina
title: (17246) wecamp Santa Cristina
description: WECAMP SANTA CRISTINA This is a Glamping. A new concept of Camping where only Campers are allowed. We thought it was wonderful!!! the tranquility, the showers, the faucets for washing, ....they even have a dishwasher!!! prices vary depending on the type of plot and the season. But if you don't need to fill water about 25 euros. if you want to fill water 30. Better to call or go in person

name: Yelloh! Village Camping Mas Sant Josep
title: (17246) Yelloh! Village Camping Mas Sant Josep
title_short: (17246) Yelloh! Village Camping Mas Sant Josep
description: Camping sant josep (yellow village)

title: (17249) Castell-Platja d'Aro - Unnamed Road
description: Steep track, not suitable for large caravans, you remove a fence and you can enter. Very quiet night.

title: (17251) Calonge - GIV-6612
description: Plane, unpaved and at least at night and weekdays quiet place. On the driveway is a short, slightly steeper, bumpy passage - in wet and for large motorhomes less suitable. Located on a small stream. A bit close to the road, but barely visible from there.

title: (17481) Sant Julià de Ramis - Poblat Ibèric
title_short: (17481) Sant Julià de Ramis - Poblat Ibèric
description: Car park in the forest near the church. View of the region. A dozen places for van and motorhome. Is near a cemetery below but not directly visible.

title: (17121) Corçà - 9 Avinguda de Santa Cristina
description: Issue of Santa Cristina. Less than 1 km from Monell. It only has a bench and a couple of stones as a table. And a trash can. Ideal to stop to eat and even spend the night because the ground is quite smooth.

title: (17481) Sant Julià de Ramis - Poblat Ibèric
title_short: (17481) Sant Julià de Ramis - Poblat Ibèric
description: Parking Església Sants Metges, surrounded by greenery and forest and overlooking the area. We were very quiet, it is a very nice place.

title: (17240) Llagostera - Unnamed Road
description: Access by track with some furrows, good for van.

title: (17481) Sant Julià de Ramis - Poblat Ibèric
title_short: (17481) Sant Julià de Ramis - Poblat Ibèric
description: Superb spot to sleep peacefully and safely. Possibility of 2 vans or 2 small motorhomes, one behind the other. Flat and shady ground at the top of a mountain located next to an old church and the Iberian village, ideal to visit and enjoy to discover Girona which is superb! Leave the place clean.

title: (17462) Sant Martí Vell - GIV-6701
description: Small picnic area at the road junction. Two tables and benches in the shade and 3 marked parking spaces with a small shadow. With water tap and pet drinker. A little earlier there is more parking area for larger vehicles.

title: (17100) La Bisbal d'Empordà - 61 Carrer del Pont
title_short: (17100) La Bisbal d'Empordà - 61 Carrer del Pont
description: Fairly flat ground parking, 5 'walk to town, good for parking and spending the night.

title: (17150) Sant Gregori - Unnamed Road
description: Dirt car park next to the Sant Gregori cemetery and a church, quite apart from the town and without prohibitions.

title: (17320) Tossa de Mar - 70 ウルバニッザシオ・サン・グラウ
title_short: (17320) Tossa de Mar - 70 ウルバニッザシオ・サン・グラウ
description: Water fountain after the church on the left side next to a small playground.

address.street: 70 ウルバニッザシオ・サン・グラウ

title: (17100) La Bisbal d'Empordà - 42 Carrer Ramon Serradell
title_short: (17100) La Bisbal d'Empordà - 42 Carrer Ramon Serradell
description: Parking supermarket very quietly with gas station without services and in the center of the bisbal de l'empordà

title: (17249) Castell-Platja d'Aro - 23 Carrer Reial
description: Dead end and unpaved street next to a playground. quiet area and close to the town center

title: (17320) Tossa de Mar - 70
description: Terrace location overlooking the sea away from the crowds. we are quiet 3 Vans in August.

title: (17100) La Bisbal d'Empordà - 8 Plaça Pere Lloberas
title_short: (17100) La Bisbal d'Empordà - 8 Plaça Pere Lloberas
description:
Excellent modern laundry, machines of all sizes, plus special stand alone pet bed washer and dryer.
Large car park alongside so perfect access.

title: (17411) Vidreres - 1 Carrer Azalea
description: It is a sandy parking lot right next to the road that at night there are almost no bakery cars just 20 meters away with garbage cans and swimming pool in the urbanization I would use it only to sleep and leave early

title: (17100) La Bisbal d'Empordà - 11 Passeig Marimon Asprer
title_short: (17100) La Bisbal d'Empordà - 11 Passeig Marimon Asprer
description: Very nice place to visit La Bisbal and / or buy the famous ceramics

title: (17411) Lloret de Mar - 10 Avinguda Mil·lenni
description: Area next to the road, little traveled, and with an esplanade where you can park a large motorhome. there are more areas but only for van since the road is complicated. is next to something with a walk through it. you sleep well and it is a quiet area. valid for overnight

name: Galp
title: (17412) Galp
description: Autogas and petrolstation GALP

title: (17412) Maçanet de la Selva - 2 Avinguda Torderola
title_short: (17412) Maçanet de la Selva - 2 Avinguda Torderola
description: Ground parking behind the Bonpreu.

name: Camp de futbol municipal Pere Plaja Girona
title: (17100) Camp de futbol municipal Pere Plaja Girona
title_short: (17100) Camp de futbol municipal Pere Plaja Girona
description: A good alternative to the motorhome area for a daytime visit in case that the 4 places at the area are full or if the motorhome area is blocked off for the Friday morning market. There was lots of space to park to visit the market and town next to the football stadium.

title: (17412) Maçanet de la Selva - 12 Avinguda Torderola
title_short: (17412) Maçanet de la Selva - 12 Avinguda Torderola
description: For all types of domestic vehicles up to 12 meters long (8 places) and also 8 other places for short or normal length vehicles up to approx. 8 meters. Self-service laundry, supermarket and gas station with LPG next door. In a very welcoming city. Ideal for AP7 travelers to rest for a few days during a long trip. A charming town with lots of history. The rules of your stay are written on a large sign at the entrance: No camping behavior (no chairs/tables/awning), stay 72 hours maximum, keep your pitches and be considerate. But free stay plus electricity 16A, as much as you need, water payable. All newly done, with small trees and benches. A safe place, quiet at night and well lit.

title: (17320) Salionç - 22 GIP-6821
description: It's a little off road going to or from tossa de mar. it's up the mountain in a really still corner. it's a very big flat opening on a curve. even though it's not on a main road there are still quite some cars and cyclist, but otherwise it's really idilic. perfect place to be

title: (17220) Sant Feliu de Guíxols - 1 Carrer Mas Trempat
title_short: (17220) Sant Feliu de Guíxols - 1 Carrer Mas Trempat
description: Laundry

title: (17412) Maçanet de la Selva - 48 Avinguda Sant Jordi
title_short: (17412) Maçanet de la Selva - 48 Avinguda Sant Jordi
description: Econet Self-Service Laundry. Open from 7:30 a.m. to 10:00 p.m. 1 Washer of 10Kg 2 Washers of 15Kg 1 Washer of 19Kg 2 Dryers of 17Kg Payment in cash, bank card, and customer card. Vending coffee and drinks.

title: (17220) Sant Feliu de Guíxols -
description: Motorhome area in Sant Feliu de Guíxols. Maximum 5 days.

title: (17220) Sant Feliu de Guíxols - 340 Carretera de Girona
title_short: (17220) Sant Feliu de Guíxols - 340 Carretera de Girona
description: You can easily buy new gas bottles at this BP petrol station. No bureaucracy, just buy. They are Repsol bottles that can easily be exchanged anywhere later. So if you have only encountered shaking heads so far, you can get gas bottles here without the hassle of bureaucracy. Very nice gas station attendant by the way.

title: (17430) Santa Coloma de Farners - 65 Carretera de Sils
title_short: (17430) Santa Coloma de Farners - 65 Carretera de Sils
description: Large Lidl supermarket parking near the city center. Good for a night or coffee stop. No service. No height bar. Huge Chinese Supermarket in front.

title: (17220) Sant Feliu de Guíxols - 6 Ronda Nord
title_short: (17220) Sant Feliu de Guíxols - 6 Ronda Nord
description: Area in the shade, picnic area!

title: (17412) Maçanet de la Selva - 5 Lloc Sud-r 5
title_short: (17412) Maçanet de la Selva - 5 Lloc Sud-r 5
description: Parking next to the supermarket, self-service laundry, pharmacy, agrobotiga with sale of gas and food for pets. Also gas station off the highway.

name: Camping Castell d'Aro
title: (17249) Camping Castell d'Aro
description: Very familiar and quiet campsite! clean showers and very nice staff. The swimming pool and the bar very top. We were able to empty and refuel with no problem! Vigilant 24 hours.

title: (17121) Corçà - 48 Carrer Major
description: Quiet parking, no noise at night. Charming little town. Routes on foot and by bike.

title: (17320) Tossa de Mar - GI-681
description: Next to the road, but you can drive all the way to the back, then you can hardly see the camper. Only stopped here for lunch, but there are no prohibition signs - you could certainly spend a good night here on the onward journey. Unfortunately a lot of rubbish.

title: (17482) Medinyà -
description: Nice spot on the river outside of Girona with bench seats. A few pedestrians and several locals on weekends but all very peaceful. The access is either via a field through the forest or via a bridge through a rain channel (only when it's dry!!) very sunny. But there is also a place in the shade. Take your rubbish with you.

title: (17120) Púbol - 3 Plaça Constitucio
description: Car park (tables, toilets, children's games, water tap, bins) at the bottom of the village, 3 minutes from the Château de Gala. Calm and pleasant.

title: (17220) Sant Feliu de Guíxols - 98 Carretera Sant Amanç
title_short: (17220) Sant Feliu de Guíxols - 98 Carretera Sant Amanç
description: Begur: At the exit of Begur from the south. Do not go into the city center. Follow the coastal road. After the supermarket, turn right. And there, several possibilities to park for the night at the level of the small roads leading to a few houses here and there.

title: (17120) La Pera - 25 Avinguda del Marquès d'Alpens
title_short: (17120) La Pera - 25 Avinguda del Marquès d'Alpens
description: Land parking at the entrance of the village. Where according to the sign, 3 motorhomes can be parked. La Pera is a beautiful medieval town, you can walk through its cobbled streets and have a drink at the bar in the square.

name: Camping Valldaro
title: (17250) Camping Valldaro
description: Castell-Platja d'Aro, 63 Carrer del Camí Vell. Camping Valldaro

title: (17462) Bordils - 16B Carrer Palagret
description: Next to it there is a bar and a soccer field. You can park day and night

title: (17320) Salionç -
description: Space for parking. Access Cala Vallpresona.

title: (17412) Maçanet de la Selva - 85 AP-7
description: Gas station, with water tap. It is located next to the fuel pumps. There is another faucet behind it but it doesn't work.

title: (17412) Maçanet de la Selva - 2 Carrer Pau Casals
title_short: (17412) Maçanet de la Selva - 2 Carrer Pau Casals
description:
Good place to stop for toilets, fuel and food along the highway! 
toilets are always a rare find...

title: (17412) Maçanet de la Selva - 13 Cami de les Monges
title_short: (17412) Maçanet de la Selva - 13 Cami de les Monges
description: Very large esplanade to be able to make a stop both during the day and spend the night. Quiet. There is a lot of room.

title: (17111) Vulpellac - Crta. C-66, km.8 (BP Vulpellac)
description: BP service station with terminal to fill and empty the water and with 4 parking spaces to spend the night with terminal to connect to the light. There is a supermarket with a bakery and all kinds of items, a washing area for motorhomes and a children's play area. Free WIFI. Terminals with tokens, with a consumption in fuel or in the supermarket, a free token

title: (17246) Santa Cristina d'Aro - GI-682
description: Parking for 3-4 vans. It is on the side of the road, but at night it is not very busy. With sea views.

title: (17320) Tossa de Mar - Unnamed Road
description: Spot for one at a crossroads. Not the easiest to get to, great view and very quiet. No shade.

title: (17220) Sant Feliu de Guíxols - 35 GI-682
description: Viewpoint on the side of the road, without shade, there is a hidden path to go down to a beach without people, the way down is slippery but safe, not suitable for the disabled.

title: (17250) Castell-Platja d'Aro - 122 Avinguda de Castell d'Aro
title_short: (17250) Castell-Platja d'Aro - 122 Avinguda de Castell d'Aro
description: Lpg station

title: (17220) Sant Feliu de Guíxols - 35 GI-682
description:
Along a busy street during the day and very good for lunch
Almost flat is fine.

title: (17220) San Felíu de Guixols - 35 GI-682
description: A beautiful place with an incredible view! Next to the street but quiet. Not really flat but possible to stay parked. Between numbers 39 and 40 of the GI-682

name: CAMPING RIEMBAU
title: (17249) CAMPING RIEMBAU
description: Campsite Riembau Clean facilities, large swimming pools, supermarket always open, large pitches 96m² (and 112m²) for caravans, motorhomes Height is unlimited Concorde come well with e-car charger available Gray water disposal is on the parking lot in front of the reception car wash unfortunately not working on the big Pool area you can drink in the evenings, live music and dance very large and especially quiet

title: (17250) S'Agaró - s/n Santiago Rusiñol
description: Overnight allowed after 11:30 p.m.

title: (17320) Tossa de Mar - Urbanització Pola-Giverola, 70
description: On a path normally not accessible but super quiet place we were not bothered, we arrived at nightfall. A 4x4 seems to be preferable...

title: (17320) Tossa de Mar -
description:
Petit lieu parfait pour un van. nous étions en T6. prenez le chemin en terre et passez le tout petit ruisseau.. il y a la place pour un seul van. 
bien à l abris des regards mais encore proche de la route.. donc un peu bruyant à partir de 6h...

title: (17251) Calonge - 21 Avinguda de Sant Jordi
description: Free parking at the entrance of the town.

title: (17111) Vulpellac - 1 C-66
description: Free land parking. Shadow. Without services Gas station 50 meters with all services. Bar / restaurant in front of the parking lot.

title: (17220) Sant Feliu de Guíxols - 56 Carretera Sant Amanç
title_short: (17220) Sant Feliu de Guíxols - 56 Carretera Sant Amanç
description: Large parking near the city center and the beach. (School parking). Take the prohibited direction (prohibited except parking access) no service. No ban on motorhomes.

title: (17482) San Julián de Ramis - Autopista del Mediterráneo
title_short: (17482) San Julián de Ramis - Autopista del Mediterráneo
description: Difficult access but very beautiful. Many mosquitoes here.

title: (17111) Vulpellac - Parc de l'U d'Octubre de 2017
title_short: (17111) Vulpellac - Parc de l'U d'Octubre de 2017
description: Parking day and night. We have spent a very quiet night, without the noise of the road from the area on the other side. The town is very pretty and very well preserved. From here you can make an excursion to the peratallada castle, by a very easy track, 8km round trip.

title: (17249) Platja d'Aro - 19 Carrer Eugeni d'Ors
description: Esplanade next to the road and flat, without service of any kind, quiet night and day, far from the center.

title: (17246) Santa Cristina d'Aro - 32 GI-682
description: Beautiful spot on the hill, village, sea and lighthouse. Place for 2 cars maximum. Dirt road in a very wide bend. Small climb difficult because of crevasses but not impossible for vehicles heavier than a van. Performed with a well-loaded 208 sw break. Fire forbidden.

title: (17220) San Felíu de Guixols - 35 GI-682
description: Superb spot (2/3 camper van), with this incredible view of the Mediterranean :) Close to the road but little traffic during this period! ENJOY

title: (17249) Platja d'Aro - 69 Avinguda de Fanals
description: Parking Esglesia de Fanals

title: (17220) Sant Feliu de Guíxols - 35 GI-682
description: Nice sea view. Unfortunately there was a lot of rubbish here, we grabbed a bag and cleaned up a bit first. After that you could enjoy it much better. You have to say that it is right on the street.

title: (17220) Sant Feliu de Guíxols - 92 Carrer de Pecher
title_short: (17220) Sant Feliu de Guíxols - 92 Carrer de Pecher
description: Communal area, empty toilet and gray water free and full of water too, no electricity

title: (17220) Sant Feliu de Guíxols - 9 Carrer Mascanada
title_short: (17220) Sant Feliu de Guíxols - 9 Carrer Mascanada
description:
Rather flat, large parking lot. 5min walk from the Centre, 5min from the beach.
emptying and clean water.
possible to sleep two days of affiliates.

title: (17220) Sant Feliu de Guíxols - 48 Urbanització Punta Brava
title_short: (17220) Sant Feliu de Guíxols - 48 Urbanització Punta Brava
description: Viewpoint facing the sea. Beautiful views of the Costa Brava just 4km from Sant Feliu de Guíxols. Quiet place to spend the night, without night traffic. That yes, we had the visit of a wild boar looking for food in the surroundings, but without danger. Without any service.

title: (17320) Tossa de Mar - 15 GIP-6821
description: Small corner on the side of the road, no passage During the night, this small spot offers us a very pleasant view when we wake up, to advise for one night

title: (17482) Sant Julià de Ramis - 28 Carrer Llevant
title_short: (17482) Sant Julià de Ramis - 28 Carrer Llevant
description: Water spring

title: (17430) Santa Coloma de Farners - 25 Carrer Salvador Espriu
title_short: (17430) Santa Coloma de Farners - 25 Carrer Salvador Espriu
description: Quiet, next to sports facilities and restaurant parking. Next to the enduro motorcycle area. Not serviced.

title: (17220) Sant Feliu de Guíxols - 100 Ronda Narcís Massanas
title_short: (17220) Sant Feliu de Guíxols - 100 Ronda Narcís Massanas
description: Large car park between a football stadium and a cemetery. Very very calm. There is shade and possibility of taking water at the cemetery

title: (17220) Sant Feliu de Guíxols - 84 Ronda Narcís Massanas
title_short: (17220) Sant Feliu de Guíxols - 84 Ronda Narcís Massanas
description: Highway towards the soccer field. In front of the paddle tennis courts. Very quiet and no noise at night and dim light. Of course, they start at 8 o'clock to play paddle tennis.

title: (17250) Platja d'Aro - 5 Carrer Roger de Llúria
title_short: (17250) Platja d'Aro - 5 Carrer Roger de Llúria
description: Very quiet shaded parking. It is next to a playground and a basketball court, among them there is a drinking water fountain, but when we went it was closed (perhaps in other seasons it does have water). It has some long seats. Garbage nearby.

title: (17250) Platja d'Aro - 27 Carrer Ginesta
description: Sandy day parking lot. Quiet, close to the city center and the beach. On the Carrefour car park. no services

title: (17430) Santa Coloma de Farners - C-152
description: Truck parking right next to the gas station. small gas station with minimarket and shower service! Large flat parking lot between the road and the forest.

name: Área de autocaravanas Sant Feliu de Guíxols
title: (17220) Área de autocaravanas Sant Feliu de Guíxols
title_short: (17220) Área de autocaravanas Sant Feliu de Guíxols
description: 5 days maximum. About 8 minutes to the beach / city. Gravel place. Well visited. Quiet at night.

title: (17320) Tossa de Mar -
description: Quiet place above Tossa de Mar with little sea view. Flat place on a bend in a road with very little traffic (no cars seen). In the morning some hikers and mountain bikers come by. Access via sand/gravel road with a few potholes, but definitely driveable with a van. A 4×4 is only helpful further up. Space for 1-2 cars.

title: (17220) Sant Feliu de Guíxols - 13 Ronda Narcís Massanas
title_short: (17220) Sant Feliu de Guíxols - 13 Ronda Narcís Massanas
description: Free parking without height limit. 5 minutes from the city center.

title: (17220) Sant Feliu de Guíxols - 9 Carretera de Girona
title_short: (17220) Sant Feliu de Guíxols - 9 Carretera de Girona
description: Laundry with dryers prices Dec 2019 cash large 6.50 dryer normal 3.50 large 4.50 washing machine normal 3.50

title: (17320) Tossa de Mar -
description: Spot with breathtaking views of the sea and the village below, delicate access because departure on the road then a road which degrades to become a stony path (we went up in kangoo). A small place to land at the top of the path, completely unobstructed view, quiet place.

name: Càmping Riudarenes S.L.
title: (17421) Càmping Riudarenes S.L.
description: Camping Riudarenes, simple place. Mainly permanent campers, few places for tourists. The full weekend, empty by the week. For motorhome about 7m difficult due to the size of the space. Sanitary facilities mostly old, cleanliness could be improved, hot water. Wireless. Bar on weekends Pool, currently not in operation. Wash / dry. Very friendly owner. To the mountain bike routes in the Santa Coloma area, approximately 5-6 km of driving on unpaved roads. Place far enough away from the square. Access by unpaved road but easy to drive. Dogs allowed

title: (17430) Santa Coloma de Farners - 12 Carrer Garrotxa
title_short: (17430) Santa Coloma de Farners - 12 Carrer Garrotxa
description: Alternative in case the nearby land parking is prohibited to park for sporting events, holidays or similar.
